content.body: TabAtkins: just FYI as a follow-up about mdn-spec-links: I unbroke the auto update workflow, so going forward it’ll be generating PRs as expected again (e.g., https://github.com/w3c/mdn-spec-links/pull/712/files) — and if/when the workflow does break again, I”ll make an effort to get it fixed quickly, so it doesn’t end leaving the data weeks/months out of date (as it had ended up being)
content.formatted_body: TabAtkins: just FYI as a follow-up about mdn-spec-links: I unbroke the auto update workflow, so going forward it’ll be generating PRs as expected again (e.g., https://github.com/w3c/mdn-spec-links/pull/712/files) — and if/when the workflow does break again, I”ll make an effort to get it fixed quickly, so it doesn’t end leaving the data weeks/months out of date (as it had ended up being)
